caption:
A love note to my babies 🤍👶🏼👶🏼 

Thank you Drew and Ben for choosing me to be your mommy.

The universe somehow knew that we needed to be together and that you would both be the right amount of silliness, intelligence and love that I needed.

You both make me laugh all day long (or at least most of the day). 

It’s hard to imagine a world where you didn’t yet exist, and some of my favorite and warmest memories begin from when you were born born.

You’ve taught me how to take better care of myself and my body, and you allowed me to learn to stand up for myself and put my own needs first in my life and career. And your needs too.

You make me want to give you the moon and the stars, and to be the very best version of myself, in the hopes that you too will want that for yourselves. Dream big little dudes.

I love you both with all my heart and thank you for making me your mama.

#happymothersday
